ValidationRule.description: Child Case Missing Info - not allowed on Child Cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISPICKVAL(Status, "Child Case Missing Info"), ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c, "Child Case"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is a child case, choose "Missing Info" instead - it will auto update the Parent Case to "Child Case Missing Info"
